customer_name: GREAT BAY COMMUNITY COLLEGE VETERINARY TECHN
site_name: GREAT BAY COMMUNITY COLLEGE VETERINARY TECHNOLOGY PROGRAM

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
There was a 8 1/2 month gap in the IACUC review of the animal care and use program from January 24, 2023 to
September 07, 2023. Performance of the program review at 6 month intervals ensures that the IACUC is updated on a
regularly on the program of animal care. The facility must ensure that the semi-annual review is conducted every 6
months.
Corrected by the facility at the subsequent review on January 9, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(c) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
There was a 8 1/2 month gap in the IACUC review of the animal care and use program from January 24, 2023 to 
September 07, 2023. Performance of the program review at 6 month intervals ensures that the IACUC is updated on a 
regularly on the program of animal care. The facility must ensure that the semi-annual review is conducted every 6 
months. 
 
Corrected by the facility at the subsequent review on January 9, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n
